CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(EV_LeadId__c), IF(ISBLANK(EV_ContactId__c), IF(ISBLANK(EV_AccountId__c), null, CASE(TEXT(EV_AccountId__r.AV_Idioma__c), '002', 'Castellano', '001', 'Catalán', '010', 'Inglés', TEXT(EV_AccountId__r.AV_Idioma__c))), CASE(TEXT(EV_ContactId__r.CC_Idioma__c), 'es', 'Castellano', 'ca', 'Catalán', 'en', 'Inglés', TEXT(EV_ContactId__r.CC_Idioma__c))), CASE(TEXT(EV_LeadId__r.EV_Idiomas__c), '002', 'Castellano', '001', 'Catalán', '010', 'Inglés', TEXT(EV_LeadId__r.EV_Idiomas__c)))
CustomField.label: Idioma
